name: @u-tools/core
description: U Tools is a simple zero-dependency, fast, and lightweight toolkit for Bun

scripts.yeet: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.yeet-all: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && cd plugins/react && npm run yeet && cd ../open-ai && npm run yeet
scripts.yeet-all-alpha: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && cd plugins/react && npm run yeet && cd ../open-ai && npm run yeet
